original_text: When he saw this, he was amazed at the sight. As he went over to get a closer look, he heard the Lord say:
korean_text: 모세가 그 광경을 보고 놀랍게 여겨 알아보려고 가까이 가니 주의 소리가 있어

sentences.original_text: he was amazed at the sight
As he went over to get a closer look
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 더 자세히 보러 다가갈 때
